Text:
@ep1x
Time to find a better AV... ;o)

NoExxcuses
Thanx for the gr8 work....downloaded..... working gr8.....showed most of the serials that my pc has installed 
Thanx again :)

Thanks. The portable works great (as usual).

As for those complaining about viruses/Trojans, hacks and cracks by their nature will turn up a false positive.  I've been using this guys offerings or quite some time and I've never had a problem. 

If are still concerned use sandboxie or deepfreeze.

Thanks for upload.
Btw, scanned it with Kaspersky and no malware found, it's clean and functional.
Warning--my AV blew away this file.  It did *NOT* mind the other torrent that isn't a portable version--it's not the keyfinding ability that it's upset about.

I don't know about the crack or installer or other files, but the portable file is clean, which is all I wanted. VirusTotal scanned it on 7/12/12 and it was clean on all 42 engines. I rescanned it on Jotti and it had 1 hit on some engine that I'm not familiar with. The rest were clean. Thanks for the upload.
